content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1588718994577{background-color: #f5f4f2 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1591925101278{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”15585″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1591922447838{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1586175543324{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1591925155539{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]SDBI is an academic platform for Data science courses offering degree programs in Data Science and Business Analytics in accreditation with the prestigious Patkar college and University of Mumbai where Industry professionals come together to develop a curriculum to bridge the gap between academics and the corporate world that exists in our current education system. Founded in 2018, SDBI is a premier education institution providing leading-edge practical learning Data Science Program. Our strategic collaboration with Industry Experts and committed faculty believes in training next-generation leaders and researchers.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Recent years have seen an upsurge in the amount of data that is being generated by, and is available to business and organization. Today, more and more organizations are opening up their doors to big data and unlocking its power—increasing the value of a data scientist who knows how to tease actionable insights out of gigabytes of data. Unfortunately, the demand of data scientists doesn’t meet its supply.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]SDBI provides students with quality educational experiences and support services that lead to the successful completion of degrees, career/technical education and basic skills proficiency.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1591974486450{background-color: #413f3f !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592187594318{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″][vc_column_inner el_class=”mkb-abt-red-hv slideInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1592187611312{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Mission” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • To foster academic and career success through the development of critical thinking, effective communication, and practical learning.
  • Our strategic collaboration with Industry Experts and committed faculty believes in training next-generation leaders and researchers.
  • To prepare graduates with strong analytical and leadership skills with a desire to make an impact in society.
  • To train next-generation professionals and entrepreneurs with quality educational experiences and support services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”mkb-abt-red-hv slideInUp” width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1592187618500{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Vision” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • To provide quality education in the expanding field of data analytics across the spectrum of aspirants, so as to produce high-calibre graduates who will contribute to industry and society through excellence in research, entrepreneurship and leadership.
  • To be recognised to greatly expand the capacity to implement data science research, industry collaborations, educational programming, and the availability of cutting-edge computational tools.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1609370976177{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_class=”mb_grey_bg”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”SDBI Method is clearly defined and the outcome is result-driven” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1588720408835{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”txt-center”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”R” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23research|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923515887{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Research based syllabus

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”E” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23globe|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923592219{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Experts from all over the globe

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”S” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23responsibility|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923612066{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Social
Responsibility

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”U” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23students|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923630567{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Understanding what our students want

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”L” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23lms|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923647025{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Learning Management System

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”T” font_container=”tag:div|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23jobs|||” el_class=”txt-center mkb-abt-alp” css=”.vc_custom_1591923656115{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Training students to be job-ready

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”research” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756344564{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”16280″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Research Based Programs” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]Our curriculum has been designed after meticulously researching the global scenario of the data world. It was a challenging and rewarding experience, as we put the best of our expertise and skill in it. The main goal is to help students pursue an in-depth or deep original study about various topics which interests them.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”globe” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756451716{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”Experts from all over the globe” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]SDBI is proud to have rich connections with Industry Experts across the globe. Our curriculum has been designed by Industry big leagues to mend the barrier that students after between academic and real world.

We host Industry Connect sessions or our students once every month where they learn the application of Data Science in various domains directly from professionals.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”16277″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_single_image image=”16277″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_custom_heading text=”Experts from all over the globe” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]SDBI is proud to have rich connections with Industry Experts across the globe. Our curriculum has been designed by Industry big leagues to mend the barrier that students after between academic and real world.

We host Industry Connect sessions or our students once every month where they learn the application of Data Science in various domains directly from professionals.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”responsibility” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756382814{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”15605″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Social Responsibility” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]It is the responsibility of educators to teach social responsibility students to make them understand complex moral issues, contribute to local and global humanitarian efforts, and learn to consider others’ perspectives. We have integrated this type of learning in our curriculum so that students naturally develop social skills and awareness.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”students” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756569204{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”Understanding what our students need” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]It is immensely essential to understand the need of students as it might get lost in the middle of rigorous academic sessions with various professors. It is important to know if they are struggling anywhere or need any help from us, and to curb this, we hold weekly sessions with our students where our Coordinator listens to what they have to say and then we try our best to solve it at our level.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”15606″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_single_image image=”15606″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_custom_heading text=”Understanding what our students need” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]It is immensely essential to understand the need of students as it might get lost in the middle of rigorous academic sessions with various professors. It is important to know if they are struggling anywhere or need any help from us, and to curb this, we hold weekly sessions with our students where our Coordinator listens to what they have to say and then we try our best to solve it at our level.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”lms” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756392456{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”16279″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_custom_heading text=”Learning Management System” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]The digitization happening across global education necessitates a smart learning platform to compliment classroom teaching. LMS is used to create structured course content. Our faculty uploads slides and notes on LMS everyday based on what is taught in the classroom. This ensures a smooth learning curve where students can access and re-use the study material whenever they want.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”jobs” el_class=”mb_abt_method”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592756651570{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_custom_heading text=”Training Students to be Job-ready” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]Our curriculum focuses immensely on practical learning through capstone projects, case studies and internships. We have a dedicated placement cell which helps students in resume building, mock interviews and placement assistance. We understand the importance of making students job ready as most of the students find it too difficult to adjust in the corporate world after graduating.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”16278″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_single_image image=”16278″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_rounded”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_custom_heading text=”Training Students to be Job-ready” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_column_text]Our curriculum focuses immensely on practical learning through capstone projects, case studies and internships. We have a dedicated placement cell which helps students in resume building, mock interviews and placement assistance. We understand the importance of making students job ready as most of the students find it too difficult to adjust in the corporate world after graduating.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1593627067478{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #df3735 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”The Big Technology trend is to make systems intelligent and data is the raw material” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1593627116501{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Get Degree in Data Science, contact us to know more” style=”flat” color=”white” size=”lg” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-chevron-circle-right” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fcontact%2F|title:Contact%20Us%20%E2%80%93%20New||”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
